channel.title: libGL error: pci id for fd 20: 80ee:beef, driver (null)
channel.description:
Hi @,
I get the following message while trying to start electrum-ltc
``` user@host:~$ electrum-ltc libGL error: pci id for fd 20: 80ee:beef, driver (null) libGL error: core dri or dri2 extension not found libGL error: failed to load driver: vboxvideo ```
Any idea on what causes this issue ?
I'm running Whonix 13.0.0.1 on VM VirtualBox 5.2.8.
Enabling 3D acceleration in the control panel doesn't solve the problem.
Does somebody can support me ? Thank you in advance.
Edit : I don't know if I need to post in the VM VirtualBox section. If I'm wrong please let me know and I'll move the post accordingly.
Edit 2 : This doesn't affect the use of the software, but I wonder if there is way to fix this or it doesn't matter and I shouldn't care about this ?
